name: Bear, Black
description: The Black Bear is a medium-sized beast characterized by its considerable physical strength and mobility, capable of traversing land quickly and climbing efficiently.
memorable: Its heightened sense of smell, allowing for exceptional perception of creatures nearby, makes it a challenging foe in its natural habitat.
goals: Typically found in wilderness areas, it seeks food and territory, embodying the role of wildlife in its environment.
relations: Often associated with other wildlife and lesser creatures in natural ecosystems.
strengths: Decent hit points, good mobility, and strong melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and armor class, making it easy to outsmart.
attacks: The bear utilizes a Multiattack, comprising a Bite attack and a Claws attack, both effective in close combat.
most_powerful_ability: Heightened Smell enhances its perception significantly, making stealthy approaches difficult.
senses: The bear possesses a Heightened Smell ability, granting it a remarkable Perception score of 18 when detecting creatures by scent.
additional_information: Strong physical power reflected in Strength score of +2.
Good durability indicated by Constitution score of +2.
Certain threats can vary due to low armor class.
